title: Fix broken portfolio image paths across all categories

requirements.summary: Fix the PortfolioGallery component to correctly reference portfolio images from the frontend/public/assets/generated directory, ensuring all 120 images display properly without broken image icons
acceptanceCriteria: All 120 portfolio images display correctly without broken image icons
Images load properly in all 4 categories (Home, Commercial, Office, Hotels)
Each category displays exactly 30 images with titles and descriptions
Images open in lightbox dialog when clicked
No console errors related to missing or invalid image paths

file_operations.description: Update all portfolio image references to use correct public asset URL format (/assets/generated/filename.png) instead of relative imports. Map the 30 home images to generated home-* filenames (home-bathroom-01.dim_800x600.png, home-bathroom-02.dim_800x600.png, home-bedroom-01.dim_800x600.png, home-bedroom-02.dim_800x600.png, home-bedroom-03.dim_800x600.png, home-dining-01.dim_800x600.png, home-dining-02.dim_800x600.png, home-kitchen-01.dim_800x600.png, home-kitchen-02.dim_800x600.png, home-living-01.dim_800x600.png, home-living-02.dim_800x600.png, home-living-03.dim_800x600.png, home-nursery-01.dim_800x600.png, home-office-01.dim_800x600.png, home-reading-01.dim_800x600.png, portfolio-living-1.dim_800x600.png through portfolio-living-10.dim_800x600.png). For Commercial, Office, and Hotels categories, generate logical placeholder references following the same naming pattern with appropriate category prefixes, preparing the data structure to accept real images when they become available. Ensure the component properly handles the public asset path format for all image references.

requirements.summary: Verify that the portfolio image filenames in the component match the exact generated filenames in frontend/public/assets/generated, using proper public asset paths instead of relative imports
acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio component uses correct public asset URL format for all images
Image filenames in component match generated asset filenames exactly
Images are served from the public directory without import errors
Browser network tab shows successful image loads with 200 status codes

file_operations.description: Verify that all image path references use the exact filenames from frontend/public/assets/generated including the .dim_800x600.png suffix for all portfolio images. Ensure the public asset URL format (/assets/generated/...) is used consistently throughout the component. Add descriptive titles and descriptions for each of the 120 portfolio items across all 4 categories. Confirm that the image paths are directly embedded as string literals in the component's portfolio data arrays, not using import statements.
